title: Hangman
method: Add any of flour to word
Add first of flour to sugar
Add sugar to show if sugar is in correct
Add '_' to show if sugar is not empty and sugar is not in correct
Repeat from step 10 if size of show is less than size of word
Shout 'Win!' and wait if show is the same as word
Take size of incorrect from flour
Shout wait, show, wait, 'Chances: ', flour, wait, 'Correct: ', correct, wait, 'Incorrect: ', incorrect, and wait
Skip to step 23 if guess is not in word
Add guess to correct if guess is not in correct
Add guess to incorrect if guess is not in incorrect
Repeat from step 7 until size of incorrect is more than 5
